item.title: Magics!@@@help@@@
item.dc:creator: @0wnz0r 0wnz0r
item.description:
@0wnz0r wrote:

This is the spell…

if (spellID == 1152) { // Wind Strike if(playerLevel[6] >= 0) { ProjectileSpellPlayer(90, 95, 92, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 1); hitDiff = misc.random(4); } else { sendMessage("You need a magic lvl of 0 for this spell !"); } }

This is the name…

sendQuest("@gre@Level 1 : Wind Strike", 1200); sendQuest("@gre@A basic Air missile", 1201);

And it could looks like…:

if (magicID == 1152) { // Wind Strike if(playerHasItemAmount(4718,1)) { stillgfx(80, absY, absX); stillgfx(179, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); stillgfx(179, EnemyY2, EnemyX2 + 1); stillgfx(179, EnemyY2+ 1, EnemyX2 + 1); stillgfx(179, EnemyY2 + 1, EnemyX2 - 1); stillgfx(179, EnemyY2 - 1, EnemyX2 - 1); stillgfx(179, EnemyY2, EnemyX2 - 1); stillgfx(179, EnemyY2 - 1, EnemyX2 + 1); stillgfx(179, EnemyY2 + 1, EnemyX2); stillgfx(179, EnemyY2 - 1, EnemyX2); hitDiff = misc.random(50); deleteItem(4718, getItemSlot(4718), 1); } else { sendMessage("You need Dharok's Great Axe to cast this spell!"); } }

HAPPY?

And stop using that retard title.

Read full topic
